entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
